Param.name: SettingsFileVersion
Param.info: This value is Read Only.

Param.name: NumBackupConfigFilesToKeep
Param.info: When saving changes or when changing the boxes in VR, a backup is made.

Param.name: AutoLaunchWithSteamVR
Param.info: Start the StopSignVR runtime automatically when starting SteamVR?

Param.name: AlertMode
Param.info: When 'No' is selected, StopSignVR is in Edit Mode and you can move and resize the boxes.

Param.name: UseBoxes
Param.info: Use boxes to warn against hitting valuable real equipment.

Param.name: TurnOffAllImpactPrediction
Param.info: Disables alerts for impact prediction. The boxes and proximity warnings are still functional.

Param.name: TurnOffAllProximityWarnings
Param.info: Disables proximity warnings (the smaller stop sign and ticking sound when close to a box or wall).

Param.name: ImpactPredictionSensitivity
Param.info: 1 = insensitive, 9 = high sensitivity.

Param.name: UseBoundariesMasterSwitch
Param.info: Master switch to turn on/off all Stop Sign warnings based on boundaries (walls, ceiling and floor).

Param.name: UseImpactPredictionForPlayAreaBoundaries
Param.info: Predict impact with Chaperone/Guardian/Boundaries walls.

Param.name: UseImpactPredictionForCeiling
Param.info: Predict impact with Ceiling. Uses ceiling height as defined in SteamVR.

Param.name: UseImpactPredictionForFloor
Param.info: Predict impact with the floor.

Param.name: UseProximityWarningForPlayAreaBoundaries
Param.info: Get proximity warnings when close to Chaperone/Guardian/Boundaries walls (smaller stop sign + ticking sound).

Param.name: UseProximityWarningForCeiling
Param.info: Get proximity warnings when close to the ceiling (smaller stop sign + ticking sound).

Param.name: UseProximityWarningForFloor
Param.info: Get proximity warnings when close to the floor (smaller stop sign + ticking sound).

Param.name: MaximumDimensionToConsiderPlayAreaStandingOnly_Meters
Param.info: If at least one side of the play area is smaller, it is considered a Standing Only area and Stop Sign alerts and warnings are disabled.

Param.name: ShowCollisionBoundsPlaySpaceRectangle
Param.info: Turn on a rectangle on the floor indicating the play area. This overrules the setting for turning it off.

Param.name: ShowCollisionBoundsGroundPerimeter
Param.info: Turn on a line on the floor indicating the position of the Chaperone/Guardian/Boundaries walls. This overrules the setting for turning it off.

Param.name: ShowCollisionBoundsCenterMarker
Param.info: Turn on a marker on the floor indicating the center of the play area. This overrules the setting for turning it off.

Param.name: HideCollisionBoundsPlaySpaceRectangle_UseWithCare
Param.info: Turn off the rectangle on the floor indicating the play area.

Param.name: HideCollisionBoundsGroundPerimeter_UseWithCare
Param.info: Turn off the line on the floor indicating the position of the Chaperone/Guardian/Boundaries walls.

Param.name: HideCollisionBoundsCenterMarker
Param.info: Turn off the marker on the floor indicating the center of the play area.

Param.name: ProximityWarningSignSize_Meters
Param.info: Width of the proximity alert stop sign that is shown when close to boxes and walls.

Param.name: AlertWarningSignSize_Meters
Param.info: Width of the impact warning alert stop sign.

Param.name: UseSound
Param.info: When 'No' is selected all StopSignVR sounds are turned off.

Param.name: UseSpatialAudio
Param.info: When 'Yes' is selected the alert sounds are positioned in 3D by Steam Audio's HRTF-based binaural rendering.

Param.name: ProximityWarningSoundFileName
Param.info: Sound for the proximity warnings. Use 32bit float WAV, pcm, mono. Sample frequency *must* be 24 kHz.

Param.name: ProximityWarningSoundVolume
Param.info: Volume to use for the proximity warnings sound.

Param.name: AlertSoundFileName
Param.info: Sound for the impact alerts. Use 32bit float WAV, pcm, mono. Sample frequency *must* be 24 kHz.

Param.name: AlertSoundVolume
Param.info: Volume to use for the impact alerts sound.

Param.name: ProximityWarningActivationDistance_Meters
Param.info: Distance in meters at which the proximity alerts activate.

Param.name: ProximityWarningTransparency
Param.info: Opacity of the proximity alert stop sign. 0.0 = fully transparent, 1.0 = opaque.

Param.name: UseHapticFeedbackForAlerts
Param.info: Rumble the controller when alerting for impacts.

Param.name: UseHapticFeedbackForProximityWarnings
Param.info: Rumble the controller when close to boxes and walls.

Param.name: UseHudVignette
Param.info: Show a Heads-Up Display for alerts and warnings when stop sign is out of sight.

Param.name: HudViewportFovHorizontal
Param.info: Horizontal Field of View of the open area in the HUD (Heads-Up Display) viewport.

Param.name: HudViewportFovVertical
Param.info: Vertical Field of View of the open area in the HUD (Heads-Up Display) viewport.

Param.name: HudTightenOutOfViewDetectionDegreesLeftRight
Param.info: Make larger if HUD shows too late (horizontally).

Param.name: HudTightenOutOfViewDetectionDegreesTopBottom
Param.info: Make larger if HUD shows too late (vertically).

Param.name: UseCustomBoundarySystem
Param.info: For use with WMR or if you want a less intrusive boundary system. Uses the chaperone color and wall height defined in SteamVR.

Param.name: UseCustomBoundarySystemForStandingOnlyPlayArea
Param.info: When the Custom Boundary System is enabled, this setting will also enable it for Standing Only play areas.

Param.name: UseImportedWMRBoundaries
Param.info: For Windows Mixed Reality (WMR) headsets on SteamVR. Use the WMR boundaries for the Boundary++ grids.

Param.name: HideNativeSteamVRChaperoneGrid
Param.info: Don't show the SteamVR chaperone grid when using Boundary++.

Param.name: HideBoundaryPlusPlusWhileDashboardActive
Param.info: Hide Boundary++ grids while the SteamVR dashboard is active (turn on if dashboard acts choppy on older systems).

Param.name: IgnoreHeadsetDistanceForCeilingBoundary
Param.info: For low ceilings that would otherwise activate too often.

Param.name: BoundaryMaxSegments
Param.info: Max number of segments to use for the Boundary++ grids.

Param.name: BoundaryMinAverageSegmentLength
Param.info: Minimum average boundary segment length.

Param.name: BoundaryMinSegmentLength
Param.info: Minimum boundary segment length.

Param.name: BoundaryQualitySettingA
Param.info: Visual quality of the Custom Boundary System (Restart needed) - A.

Param.name: BoundaryQualitySettingB
Param.info: Visual quality of the Custom Boundary System (Restart needed) - B.

Param.name: StandingOnlyPlayAreaWidth_Meters
Param.info: For Standing Only setups. Set play area width to the supplied distance in meters.

Param.name: StandingOnlyPlayAreaDepth_Meters
Param.info: For Standing Only setups. Set play area depth to the supplied distance in meters.

Param.name: BoundaryMaxOpaquenessOfGrid
Param.info: This caps the transparency you set in the SteamVR play area settings for the Chaperone transparency.

Param.name: BoundaryMaxOpaquenessForLogoOnWalls
Param.info: The 'logo on the walls' is the letters STOP. Reduce this number if you want to see through the logo.

Param.name: BoundaryMaxOpaquenessForViewBlockingThroughWalls
Param.info: Reduce this number if you want to see through the area inside the grid octagons (around the STOP logo) when you're close to a boundary.

Param.name: BoundaryMaxOpaquenessForViewBlockingThroughCeiling
Param.info: Reduce this number if you want to see through the area inside the grid octagons when you're close to the ceiling.

Param.name: BoundaryBlockViewWhenCloseToWalls
Param.info: When true (default), your view will be blocked where you're close to a wall grid.

Param.name: BoundaryBlockViewWhenCloseToCeiling
Param.info: When true (default), your view will be blocked where you're close to the ceiling grid.

Param.name: BoundaryActivationDistanceMultiplier
Param.info: If using both the default Chaperone and the Boundary++ warning grid system, you can choose which one comes up earlier. Values > 1.0 will have Boundary++ come up before default Chaperone. Values < 1.0 causes it to show later than default Chaperone.

Param.name: NumBoxes
Param.info: This value is calculated. Do not change.
